item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 4th April
item.description:
Customer reporting repeated failures of 2 sets of temp lights along Green Street. Has attempted to report on 4 occasions, using number stated on info board set up at roadside. Lights currently out of action.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
